entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
